mapper.insert: insert into scenic_discuss (user_id, scenice_id, content, creat_time) values (#{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{sceniceId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creatTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.select: select id, user_id, scenice_id, content, creat_time from scenic_discuss
select sd.id,username userName,scenice_id sceniceId, content, creat_time creatTime from scenic_discuss sd LEFT JOIN sys_user u ON user_id=u.id WHERE scenice_id=#{scenicId} ORDER BY creat_time
select pic_url path from sys_file WHERE JOIN_ID=#{joinId} AND type='discuss' ORDER BY creat_time
